name: Mars Bike Space Race Extreme Car Racing Game
name_original: Mars Bike Space Race Extreme Car Racing Game
description:
Welcome to the race of the future. You’ll need to keep your eyes opened and your nerves under control in this super fast racing game. After you manage to finish a level, there will be a new one unlocked, together with a brand new car. Speaking of cars, each of them is equipped with a turbocharged engine, custom suspension and most importantly - a high calibre automatic gun, that you can use to persuade other drivers to get out of your way. Avoid any collisions, collect coins and bonuses to unlock tons of new stuff. See you at the finish line!

Game features:

- Great music and sound effects
- 4 awesome maps and vehicles
- Compare your results with other players
- Different difficulty levels for all ages
- Advanced physics
